plot: A 50-year-old man and a young woman take a trip from the beach to the countryside driving their Chevette 79, trying to find their love again, or losing it forever. After a while, they begin a strange sexual game.
title: Trópico das Cabras
plot_es: A 50-year-old man and a young woman take a trip from the beach to the countryside driving their Chevette 79, trying to find their love again, or losing it forever. After a while, they begin a strange sexual game.
plot_en: A 50-year-old man and a young woman take a trip from the beach to the countryside driving their Chevette 79, trying to find their love again, or losing it forever. After a while, they begin a strange sexual game.
